stories.text:
Hi, I'm Zhiyuan Ju[1] from China, and since my graduation from university in 2019, I started contributing to the Apache APISIX project[2], and now it's more like an ecosystem including API Gateway, Kubernetes Ingress Controller, and Service Mesh. Also, its community provides WASM and multi-language support (not only Lua ).

In the past 2 years, it grows very fast in China, that's because it was born in China but donated to Apache Software Foundation after several months, now it's the Top-Level Project in the foundation.

For now, we have user cases[3] like Tencent, Airwallex, Weibo, WPS, NASA, and so on. If you have any demands when using API Gateway product, have a try on Apache APISIX

As an Open Source project, contributors and Apache Software Foundation's culture are the DNA of the Apache APISIX Community, let's give to our team![4]

[1] http://github.com/juzhiyuan [2] http://apisix.apache.org/ [3] https://apisix.apache.org/showcase [4] https://apisix.apache.org/team
stories.title: Use Apache APISIX in production to manage API traffic
